bibl.title: P. Cairo Masp. I 67120 recto and the Liability for Latent Defects in the Late Antique Slave Sales or Back to Epaphe.
bibl.note: Originally presented as one of Iza Bieżuńska Memorial Lectures in December 2010. - Introduction. - 1. Late antique slave-sales. - 2. P. Cairo Masp. I 67120. - 3. Warranties for the defects. - 4. Epaphe. - 5. Epaphe in the late Byzantine documents.
